product_name: FalconGuides Day Hikes Around Los Angeles - 5th Edition
long_description: In its 5th edition, Day Hikes Around Los Angeles offers 135 great hikes in and around Los Angeles, exploring hundreds of miles of trails, providing great escapes into the outdoors.
short_description: In its 5th edition, Day Hikes Around Los Angeles offers 135 great hikes in and around Los Angeles, exploring hundreds of miles of trails, providing great escapes into the outdoors.
